name: Jack The Cracker!
description:
Check out Jack The Cracker!

A fun number guessing game for Android by Kevin Loring!

The game starts easily enough, you have 10 tries to guess the 2-digit number. For each level completed, the game adds 1 digit to the number! So by level 10 your working on a 10-digit number! Fast intuitive gameplay! Fun for all ages.

Try to beat your high score!

This game is intended for everyone ages 6+

If you like this game you can check out my other games and apps at http://kevinloring.itch.io

Please DONATE to my startup! http://gofundme.com/99bottles

I have several updates intended for this cute game. Come back soon to see ew features! Be sure to Follow Me!

UPDATED! Cleaner Code, Faster Play! Upgraded Interface! New Features!
